B09F3E4946D199E91CE4BF83845A8F10: Find me in the land of The Ninja.
AC219D9C42C667DA1657D7B488554354: Looming lightning bears with electrified pelts used in crafting Ninja gear. Drawn to the power of lightning, these creatures can be found during rainy or stormy weather.
501CBFA0474105181DBCBD86B1EDE6B1: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the elements locked within.
